title: 3 and Out - Chargers/Chiefs Reaction Week 2 NFL Preview + 3 for the $$ Picks
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Chargers/Chiefs Reaction Week 2 NFL Preview + 3 for the $$ Picks
description:
John reacts to the Chiefs getting the best of the Chargers in a huge early season TNF matchup, and gives his take on Amazon’s broadcast. Then, he explains his biggest red flag on Russell Wilson as a franchise QB, how the Saints missed an opportunity to draft Patroick Mahomes, and if the Colts made a mistake getting rid of Carson Wentz.

Finally, runs his top 3 Week 2 NFL games - and exclusive bonus pick - by Action Network sharp Stuckey to see if there's professional agreement or disagreement! 

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #Volume #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
